entry.title: Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Hand & Body Lotion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Lotions
Price: 18.39 - 22.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Hand and Body Lotion is an ultra hydrating, silky body moisturizer that smoothly glides over your skin giving it a smooth-as-satin texture and leaving it feeling velvety-soft to touch. The following are additional features of this hand and body lotion: 
  • 99% Natural • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Gluten • No Sulphates • Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive
  • Contains Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Almond Oil, and Sunflower Oil which forms a protective barrier over your skin to hold in moisture and effectively relieve dry itchy skin
  • This Hand & Body Lotion can offer some sun protection and support treatment of skin conditions like eczema, psoriasis, and skin inflammation for healthier looking skin
  • The Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, and Almond Oil ingredients assist the anti-wrinkle process by boosting your skin's collagen production and reducing wrinkles, fine lines, and skin sagging for a younger looking appearance
  • Taza Natural Hand & Body Lotion and Taza Peppermint Dead Sea Salt Scrub are frequently purchased together

Key Ingredients: Glycerin, Sunflower Seed Oil, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil and Vitamin E. Our hand and body lotions also come in Coconut Lime, Unscented, and Olive. These lotions are paraben, phthalates, gluten and sulphates free, and suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive.

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Hand & Body Lotion to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Get your Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Hand & Body Lotion.

Get these other excellent Taza Natural Hand and Body Lotions: Coconut Hand & Body Lotion and Olive Hand & Body Lotion.

entry.title: Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Body Butter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Body Butter
Price: 14.39 - 17.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Body Butter is exclusively formulated with the vitamin rich natural moisturizers of Shea, Cocoa, and Pumpkin butters. It is an ultra-concentrated moisturizer that will give you intense hydration to leave your skin smooth, healthy and soft. Our blend of Sunflower, Coconut, Grapeseed, and Almond oils penetrate and absorb easily into your skin; leaving your skin soft but not greasy. A little goes a long way. The following are additional features of this body butter:

  • 100% Natural • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Gluten • No Sulphates • Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive
  • Enriched with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Pumpkin Butter, Cocoa Butter, and Sunflower Oil to provide long lasting intense moisture for very dry skin
  • This body butter is very high in Omega 3 and Antioxidants to soften and provide long lasting hydration; it also rejuvenates your skin, treats and prevents stretch marks, and effectively relieves dry itchy skin, cracked heels, rough skin, sun damage
  • The Shea Butter, Pumpkin Butter, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Grapeseed Oil, and Almond Oil ingredients assist the anti-wrinkle process by boosting your skin's collagen production and reducing wrinkles, fine lines, and skin sagging for a younger looking appearance
  • The Cocoa Butter also improves skins elasticity and tone, helps reduce scars and stretch marks; amazing for dry skin and can actually penetrate further than the top layer of the skin, meaning it moisturizes deep-down and really nourishes the skin

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Body Butter to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Get your Taza Natural Unscented African Shea Body Butter.

Get also the Taza Natural Coconut Body Butter.
